title: Callow Jushi
text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Callow Jushi.At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Callow Jushi, you may flip it.----Jaraku the InterloperLegendary Creature — Spirit3/4Remove a ki counter from Jaraku the Interloper: Counter target spell unless its controller pays .
